product.name: Joossnwell Bathroom Light Fixture Brushed Nickel Vanity Light Bar 5CCT Dimmable Modern Lighting Over Mirror LED 15.74 Inch ETL Certificated
product.description:
Nickel Vanity Light
Nickel Vanity Light
Nickel Vanity Light
Black Vanity Light
Nickel Vanity Light
Black Vanity Light
Nickel Vanity Light
Different sizes and colors are available
Anti-corrosion, rust-proof, water-proof and dust-proof
Rotate up and down 270° for downward
Energy saving & easy installation
product.bullet_points:
• 5 Color Changeable: Our brushed nickel bathroom light fixtures is with 5 colors temperature according to your actual need, there is a SHIFT key on the side of the vanity lights base, and freely choose soft white/warm white/cool white/Day light temperature to meet your mood
• Dimmable Function: Bathroom lighting fixtures with ETL certificated dimmable driver ensure the vanity light bar to 5%-100% dimming range, the modern bathroom light compatible with most household triac LED dimmers for smooth and flicker-free operation.you can switch the mirror lights freely to the dimming range
• Energy Saving And Easy Installation: integrated Led light source 12W modern vanity light, voltage: 110V / 120V. LED technology saves up to 80% electricity compare to conventional light bulbs and lifespan up to 30,000 hours. Easy to instal the vanity light fixtures over mirror just connect to the reserved wire directly
• Durable Vanity Light: Led bathroom vanity light is made of metal material and white acrylic cover, with anti-corrosion, anti-rust, waterproof and dustproof ability
• Wide Application: Perfect for you indoor bathroom fixtures as vanity lights for mirror, dressing table mirror lights for makeup, led lights for bathroom cabinet, restroom lights for vanity mirror , powder room wall light fixture etc
